import React from 'react' import '../index.css' import Header from '../components/Header' import Main from '../components/Main' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm' function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false) const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setPlacePopupOpen] = React.useState(false) const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setAvatarPopupOpen] = React.useState(false) function handleEditAvatarClick() { setAvatarPopupOpen(!isEditAvatarPopupOpen) } function handleEditProfileClick() { setProfilePopupOpen(!isEditProfilePopupOpen) } function handleAddPlaceClick() { setPlacePopupOpen(!isAddPlacePopupOpen) } function closeAllPopups() { document.querySelector('popup').classList.remove('.popup_opened') setAvatarPopupOpen(!isEditAvatarPopupOpen) setProfilePopupOpen(!isEditProfilePopupOpen) setPlacePopupOpen(!isAddPlacePopupOpen) } return ( <>
); } export default App;
